title: People in Old Testament Jerusalem suffered from widespread dysentery, study finds
description: Study results indicate "long-term presence" of Giardia parasite in Near East populations.

title: Ford EVs will get access to Tesla’s Supercharger network in 2024
description: Current Ford EVs will be able to use more than 12,000 chargers with an adapter.

title: Among AI dangers, deepfakes worry Microsoft president most
description: Brad Smith urges steps to curtail deepfakes "with an intent to deceive or defraud."

title: Unearthed: CosmicEnergy, malware for causing Kremlin-style power disruptions
description: Researchers say never-before-seen malware may be used in Russian training exercises.

title: A new report finds NASA has spent an obscene amount of money on SLS propulsion
description: "NASA and its contracts will continue to exceed planned cost and schedule."

title: YouTube Stories, Google’s clone of Snapchat, is dying on June 26
description: Google's clone of TikTok is a decent replacement for its clone of Snapchat.

title: Tetris on a chicken nugget is the game as it was meant to be played
description: Latest McDonald's China promotion is probably the weirdest official Tetris ever.

title: Supreme Court limits the EPA’s authority under the Clean Water Act
description: Court limits regulations to wetlands that directly connect to bodies of water.

title: OpenAI CEO raises $115M for crypto company that scans people’s eyeballs
description: Worldcoin investor insists "Orb" iris scanner is not a "dystopian nightmare."

title: Google Search starts rolling out ChatGPT-style generative AI results
description: If you opt-in to generative AI, big, colorful boxes will appear in search.

title: Alan Wake 2 and the death of disc-based video games
description: Big-budget digital-only release could be a preview of console gaming's future.

title: DeSantis/Musk event didn’t break the Internet, but it did break Twitter
description: Half of DeSantis’ audience ditched his glitchy Twitter Spaces campaign launch.

title: Minnesota enacts right-to-repair law that covers more devices than any other state
description: Just one state demanding free repair manuals could benefit all fixers.

title: Two dead in US from tainted surgeries in Mexico; 206 more may have brain infections
description: Those exposed should seek medical care ASAP, even if there are no symptoms.

title: Blank-screen bug triggers first Vinfast VF8 recall
description: Turning the car off and on again brings it back, but there's a software fix.

title: The neurons that make you feel hangry
description: Brain area that stimulates appetite could be a target for eating-disorder therapies.

title: At long last, the glorious future we were promised in space is on the way
description: "It is gratifying to see folks coming around."
